name: Go, Go Cowboy
description:
Go, Go Cowboy-Fast Top-Down-Shooter where the player acts as a Sheriff and clears randomly generated levels, with each level the enemies become more difficult, and the worlds are more hardcore, you can control a revolver or a saber, and after passing all the worlds you will get a Gatling machine Gun in your possession!


Feature of game:
- Hardcore
- Pixel-Art
- Random Generation Of Levels
- Increasing Complexity
- Boss
